13  package net.sf.oval.test.guard;
14  
15  import java.math.BigDecimal;
16  import java.util.Date;
17  
18  import junit.framework.TestCase;
19  import net.sf.oval.constraint.Assert;
20  import net.sf.oval.constraint.NotNull;
21  import net.sf.oval.exception.ConstraintsViolatedException;
22  import net.sf.oval.guard.Guard;
23  import net.sf.oval.guard.Guarded;
24  import net.sf.oval.guard.Post;
25  import net.sf.oval.guard.Pre;
26  
27  /**
28   * @author Sebastian Thomschke
29   */
30  public class PrePostGroovyTest extends TestCase
31  {
32  	@Guarded
33  	public static class TestTransaction
34  	{
35  		@SuppressWarnings("unused")
36  		protected Date date;
37  
38  		@SuppressWarnings("unused")
39  		protected String description;
40  
41  		protected BigDecimal value;
42  
43  		@Post(expr = "_this.valuePost != null", lang = "groovy", message = "POST")
44  		public BigDecimal getValuePost()
45  		{
46  			return value;
47  		}
48  
49  		@Post(expr = "_this.valuePost != null && _old.valuePost != null", old = "[valuePost:_this.value]", lang = "groovy", message = "POST")
50  		public BigDecimal getValuePostWithOld()
51  		{
52  			return value;
53  		}
54  
55  		@Pre(expr = "_this.valuePre != null", lang = "groovy", message = "PRE")
56  		public BigDecimal getValuePre()
57  		{
58  			return value;
59  		}
60  
61  		@Pre(expr = "_this.value!=null && value2add!=null && _args[0]!=null", lang = "groovy", message = "PRE")
62  		public void increase1(@Assert(expr = "_value!=null", lang = "groovy", message = "ASSERT")
63  		final BigDecimal value2add)
64  		{
65  			value = value.add(value2add);
66  		}
67  
68  		@Post(expr = "_this.value>_old.value", old = "[value:_this.value]", lang = "groovy", message = "POST")
69  		public void increase2(@NotNull
70  		final BigDecimal value2add)
71  		{
72  			value = value.add(value2add);
73  		}
74  
75  		@Post(expr = "_this.value>_old.value", old = "[value:_this.value]", lang = "groovy", message = "POST")
76  		public void increase2buggy(@NotNull
77  		final BigDecimal value2add)
78  		{
79  			value = value.subtract(value2add);
80  		}
81  	}
82  
83  	public void testCircularConditionsGroovy()
84  	{
85  		final Guard guard = new Guard();
86  		TestGuardAspect.aspectOf().setGuard(guard);
87  
88  		final TestTransaction t = new TestTransaction();
89  		try
90  		{
91  			// test circular pre-condition
92  			t.getValuePre();
93  		}
94  		catch (final ConstraintsViolatedException ex)
95  		{
96  			assertEquals(ex.getConstraintViolations()[0].getMessage(), "PRE");
97  		}
98  
99  		try
100 		{
101 			// test circular post-condition
102 			t.getValuePost();
103 		}
104 		catch (final ConstraintsViolatedException ex)
105 		{
106 			assertEquals(ex.getConstraintViolations()[0].getMessage(), "POST");
107 		}
108 
109 		try
110 		{
111 			// test circular post-condition
112 			t.getValuePostWithOld();
113 		}
114 		catch (final ConstraintsViolatedException ex)
115 		{
116 			assertEquals(ex.getConstraintViolations()[0].getMessage(), "POST");
117 		}
118 
119 		t.value = new BigDecimal(0);
120 		t.getValuePre();
121 		t.getValuePost();
122 		t.getValuePostWithOld();
123 	}
124 
125 	public void testPostGroovy()
126 	{
127 		final Guard guard = new Guard();
128 		TestGuardAspect.aspectOf().setGuard(guard);
129 
130 		final TestTransaction t = new TestTransaction();
131 
132 		try
133 		{
134 			t.value = new BigDecimal(-2);
135 			t.increase2buggy(new BigDecimal(1));
136 			fail();
137 		}
138 		catch (final ConstraintsViolatedException ex)
139 		{
140 			assertEquals(ex.getConstraintViolations()[0].getMessage(), "POST");
141 		}
142 
143 		t.increase2(new BigDecimal(1));
144 	}
145 
146 	public void testPreGroovy()
147 	{
148 		final Guard guard = new Guard();
149 		TestGuardAspect.aspectOf().setGuard(guard);
150 
151 		final TestTransaction t = new TestTransaction();
152 
153 		try
154 		{
155 			t.increase1(new BigDecimal(1));
156 			fail();
157 		}
158 		catch (final ConstraintsViolatedException ex)
159 		{
160 			assertEquals(ex.getConstraintViolations()[0].getMessage(), "PRE");
161 		}
162 
163 		try
164 		{
165 			t.value = new BigDecimal(2);
166 			t.increase1(null);
167 			fail();
168 		}
169 		catch (final ConstraintsViolatedException ex)
170 		{
171 			assertEquals(ex.getConstraintViolations()[0].getMessage(), "ASSERT");
172 		}
173 		try
174 		{
175 			t.increase1(new BigDecimal(1));
176 		}
177 		catch (final ConstraintsViolatedException ex)
178 		{
179 			System.out.println(ex.getConstraintViolations()[0].getMessage());
180 		}
181 	}
182 }
